backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining data types (Article, XPost, Spotlight, Wisdom, Resource, etc.) and CRUD operations for a content management backend, using Map storage and blob storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms the old Spotlight type (with optional image) to a new Spotlight type (with required image), converting null images to empty strings during state migration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping three spotlight-related features (add/edit dialog image upload and display card banner image) to their implementing frontend files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short summaries of each frontend source file, describing component responsibilities, admin gating, and recent changes to hooks and dialogs.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS base styles defining OKLCH CSS custom properties for light and dark themes, including background, foreground, card, sidebar, and chart color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React app titled 'Connect the Dots.ICP', mounting the app into a root div and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component providing tab-based navigation across all content sections, Internet Identity login/logout with admin detection, and a hero header with gradient styling.
frontend/src/components/AddArticleDialog: A dialog component for adding a new ICP progress article with title, URL, and thumbnail upload fields, using the useAddArticle mutation and ExternalBlob for file handling with upload progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/AddCybercrimeArt: A dialog component for adding a cybercrime-related article with title, URL, and thumbnail fields, using the useAddCybercrimeArticle mutation and ExternalBlob for image upload with progress display.
frontend/src/components/AddHomePageLinkD: A dialog component for adding a new home page link with title, URL, and thumbnail image upload, using the useAddHomePageLink mutation and showing upload progress via a Progress bar.
frontend/src/components/AdditionalResour: A placeholder UI component that renders an 'Additional Resources' section with a card indicating the content is coming soon.
frontend/src/components/AddResourceDialo: A dialog component for adding a trusted ICP ecosystem resource with name, description, and URL fields, using the useAddResource mutation without any file upload.
frontend/src/components/AddSpotlightDial: A dialog component for adding an ecosystem spotlight entry with a required header image (with preview), title, content, and optional link fields, using the useAddSpotlight mutation and ExternalBlob for image upload.
A dialog component for adding an investing wisdom quote with quote text and author fields, using the useAddWisdom mutation with no file upload.
frontend/src/components/AddXPostDialog.t: A dialog component for uploading X (Twitter) post screenshots with an optional description, including image file selection, upload progress tracking, and form submission via the useAddXPost mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/CybercrimeAwaren: Displays a grid of cybercrime awareness articles fetched from the backend, with admin controls to add, edit, and delete articles via dialogs and a confirmation alert.
frontend/src/components/EcosystemSpotlig: Renders a list of ICP ecosystem spotlight entries with banner images, dates, and links, supporting admin add/edit/delete operations through dialogs and confirmation alerts.
frontend/src/components/EditArticleDialo: A dialog form for editing an existing article's title, URL, and optional thumbnail image, using the useUpdateArticle mutation and showing upload progress when a new image is selected.
frontend/src/components/EditCybercrimeAr: A dialog form for editing a cybercrime article's title, URL, and optional thumbnail, using the useUpdateCybercrimeArticle mutation with upload progress support, nearly identical in structure to EditArticleDialog.
frontend/src/components/EditHomePageLink: A dialog component for editing an existing homepage link, allowing users to update the title, URL, and optional thumbnail image with upload progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/EditMissionDialo: A dialog component for editing mission content (title, description, and multiple images), with multi-file upload progress tracking and form validation.
frontend/src/components/EditResourceDial: A dialog component for editing a trusted resource's name, description, and URL, using the useUpdateResource mutation hook with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/EditSpotlightDia: A dialog component for editing an ecosystem spotlight entry, supporting updates to title, content, optional link, and header image with preview and upload progress.
frontend/src/components/EditWisdomDialog: A dialog component for editing an investing wisdom entry's quote and author fields, using the useUpdateWisdom mutation hook with toast notifications.
A dialog component for editing an X (Twitter) post's description and optional screenshot image, with upload progress display and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/HomePageLinks.ts: Displays a grid of quick links with thumbnails, supporting admin add/edit/delete operations via dialogs and confirmation alerts.
Renders a grid of investing quotes/wisdom cards with admin controls for adding, editing, and deleting entries.
frontend/src/components/LatestProgress.t: Shows a grid of articles with thumbnail images under a 'Probably Nothingâ€¦' heading, with admin add/edit/delete functionality.
frontend/src/components/MissionPage.tsx: Displays the site's mission content (title, description, images) fetched from the backend, with an admin edit dialog.
frontend/src/components/NavigationMenu.t: A dropdown navigation menu listing all main app sections, highlighting the active tab and triggering tab changes on selection.
frontend/src/components/TrustedResources: Renders a grid of trusted ICP ecosystem resources with admin controls for adding, editing, and deleting entries.
frontend/src/components/XPosts.tsx: React component that displays a gallery of X (Twitter) post screenshots, with admin controls to add, edit, and delete posts using dialogs and confirmation alerts.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing Internet Identity authentication state, including login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend CRUD operations (articles, X posts, spotlights, etc.), wrapping actor calls with mutations and queries that show toast notifications on success or error.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives and defines light/dark mode CSS custom properties using oklch color values for a futuristic ICP-themed design system.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with oklch-based design tokens, custom fonts, glow box shadows, gradient utilities, and animation keyframes for the ICP theme.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file recording existing implemented features and pending feature requests, primarily around adding and displaying header photos for ecosystem spotlight entries.
